description: Petrol d.d., Ljubljana is the leading energy company and, in terms of revenue, one of the largest companies in Slovenia. It is one of the major trading companies in Slovenia and the leading supplier of petroleum products, gas and other energy commodities on the domestic market. As a group, Petrol has been successfully positioning itself as an important regional partner in SEE markets.The core activities of the Petrol Group, which is made up of 34 subsidiaries and 3 jointly controlled and associated companies in addition to the parent company, are fuels and petroleum products, merchandise and services, and energy and solutions. In terms of development, the Petrol Group has been focused on the energy activities and renewable electricity generation, its competitive advantage being the provision of comprehensive energy solutions.With a vision to become an integrated partner in the energy transition by providing an excellent customer experience, it puts customers at the forefront of its activities, aiming to become their first choice on the go with its wide range of energy commodities, comprehensive energy solutions and digitalisation. At the same time, it is committed to the sustainable development and to creating a green energy future, with the goal of generating a long-term value for its customers, shareholders, and the society.
